price: Suka ce: "Yã Zulƙarnaini! Lalle ne Yãjũja da Majũja mãsu ɓarna ne a cikin ƙasa. To, ko zã mu Sanya harãji sabõda kai, a kan ka sanya wani danni a tsakãninmu da tsakãninsu?"
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰذَا ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِ إِنَّ يَأۡجُوجَ وَمَأۡجُوجَ مُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَهَلۡ نَجۡعَلُ لَكَ خَرۡجًا عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَجۡعَلَ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ سَدّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yādhā al-qarnayni inna yajūja wamajūja muf'sidūna fī al-arḍi fahal najʿalu laka kharjan ʿalā an tajʿala baynanā wabaynahum saddan
